data.comment: Today's match is followed by [59] spectators.
Today's match is followed by [59] spectators.
The match has started.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Alassane Plea.
Jonas Hofmann instrumental with a fine assist.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
Throw-in for Frankfurt in their own half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
M´gladbach drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Goal! M´gladbach extend their lead to 0-2 through Marcus Thuram.
That's a fine assist from Ramy Bensebaini.
Free kick Frankfurt.
Nico Elvedi (M´gladbach) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Bas Dost fires in a strike for Frankfurt.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Bas Dost (Frankfurt) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
M´gladbach have a goal kick.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Felix Zwayer signals a M´gladbach throw-in in Frankfurt's half.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Frankfurt, M´gladbach push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Alassane Plea of M´gladbach smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
M´gladbach's Jonas Hofmann gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Felix Zwayer awards Frankfurt a goal kick.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Can Frankfurt get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in M´gladbach's half?
Free kick for Frankfurt in the half of M´gladbach.
Filip Kostic gets his shot on target but fails to score for Frankfurt.
In Frankfurt, Stefan Ilsanker of Frankfurt is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
At Commerzbank Arena, Filip Kostic has been yellow-carded for the home team.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Frankfurt M´gladbach drive forward through Marcus Thuram. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Frankfurt's [62] gets in a shot but it is blocked by a [60] defender.
M´gladbach awarded a throw-in in their own half.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Evan N`Dicka (Frankfurt) has received a first yellow card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Frankfurt's Almamy Toure is on target but unsuccessful.
Can M´gladbach get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Frankfurt's half?
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
M´gladbach drives forward and Alassane Plea gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
M´gladbach have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for Frankfurt in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Commerzbank Arena.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Adi Hutter (Frankfurt) is making a first substitution, with Andre Silva replacing Djibril Sow.
Goal kick for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick M´gladbach.
M´gladbach advance rapidly upfield but Felix Zwayer blows for offside.
Frankfurt drive upfield and Daichi Kamada gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a M´gladbach defender.
Corner awarded to Frankfurt.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
M´gladbach are pushing forward but Florian Neuhaus's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
Throw-in for M´gladbach in their own half.
Bas Dost's header is off-target for Frankfurt.
Felix Zwayer awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to M´gladbach.
Throw-in for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Frankfurt capitalize from this throw-in deep inside M´gladbach's half?
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for M´gladbach, close to Frankfurt's area.
M´gladbach's Ramy Bensebaini misses with an attempt on goal.
Frankfurt have a goal kick.
M´gladbach awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andre Silva (Frankfurt) has received a yellow card from Felix Zwayer.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Frankfurt to check on Matthias Ginter, who is grimacing with pain.
M´gladbach’s Matthias Ginter is on his feet again at Commerzbank Arena.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
At Commerzbank Arena, Frankfurt are penalized for being offside.
Frankfurt to take a throw-in in M´gladbach territory.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Frankfurt in their own half.
Free kick for M´gladbach in their own half.
Frankfurt awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Rose is making the team's first substitution at Commerzbank Arena with Patrick Herrmann replacing Marcus Thuram.
Alassane Plea hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for M´gladbach!
Patrick Herrmann of M´gladbach gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Frankfurt goal kick.
Frankfurt have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In Frankfurt a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stefan Ilsanker is booked for the home team.
M´gladbach are coming forward and [49] gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
M´gladbach have been awarded a penalty...
M´gladbach are going well in Frankfurt. They now lead 0-3 thanks to a Ramy Bensebaini penalty.
Ball safe as M´gladbach is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Frankfurt make their second substitution with Makoto Hasebe replacing David Abraham.
The home team replace Stefan Ilsanker with Timothy Chandler.
Throw-in for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
The away team have replaced Breel Embolo with Lars Stindl. This is the second substitution made today by Marco Rose.
Mijat Gacinovic is replacing Daichi Kamada for the home team.
Oscar Wendt is replacing Ramy Bensebaini for M´gladbach at Commerzbank Arena.
Frankfurt push forward at Commerzbank Arena and [62] gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined [60] defence.
Frankfurt are back in the match in Frankfurt. Andre Silva has scored to make it 1-3.
Sebastian Rode with an assist there.
Frankfurt awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Frankfurt.
Dominik Kohr is replacing Evan N`Dicka for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
Throw-in M´gladbach.
Jonas Hofmann (M´gladbach) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to M´gladbach in their own half.
Frankfurt's Mijat Gacinovic breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Felix Zwayer awards M´gladbach a goal kick.
Important block from the M´gladbach defence as Dominik Kohr fires in a strike for Frankfurt.
M´gladbach pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick M´gladbach.
Frankfurt's Dominik Kohr has been booked in Frankfurt.
In Frankfurt M´gladbach attack through Lars Stindl. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Frankfurt at Commerzbank Arena.
M´gladbach's Patrick Herrmann breaks free at Commerzbank Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Frankfurt.
Free kick for M´gladbach in the half of Frankfurt.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Frankfurt's [62] gets in a shot but it is blocked by a [60] defender.
Timothy Chandler of Frankfurt smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Frankfurt in Frankfurt.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
Laszlo Benes is on a sub for Florian Neuhaus for M´gladbach.
Tony Jantschke is on a sub for Alassane Plea for M´gladbach.
